data.text:
New York: The Heritage Press, 1949. Lamotte, Bernard. Reissue. Hard Cover. Very Good / Very Good. Item #2333345

Includes publisher's slipcase and Sandglass insert Number XII:15. Spine toned, top slipcase corner bumped, small spot on slipcase edge.

xiii, [3], 69 pp. A short story by the French poet, journalist, and novelist. The son of a Paris bookseller, he won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1921. Translated from the original French, with an introduction, by Jacques LeClercq. Illustrations by Bernard Lamotte.
